page.syntax: SQL::ResultSet ResultSetFromADORecordSet(RecordSet as P [, Connection as P])
page.description: Create a SQL::ResultSet object for an ADODB RecordSet.
page.original:
SQL::Connection::ResultSetFromADORecordSet() Syntax as SQL::ResultSet = ResultSetFromADORecordSet( OpenRecordSet as OLE::ADODB.RecordSet [, Connection as OLE::ADODB.Connection ] ) ArgumentDescription
OpenRecordSet Connection
Description The SQL::Connection::ResultSetFromADORecordSet()creates a SQL::ResultSet object for an open ADO Recordset. This object can be passed to SQL update functions. The Record set (and connection if provided) will be closed when the ResultSet goes out of scope. Limitations Example
See Also
